children.title: authorizationUri
children.description: The URI of the Resource Owner Authorization endpoint as defined in RFC5849 Section 2.2

children.title: requestTokenUri
children.description: The URI of the Temporary Credential Request endpoint as defined in RFC5849 Section 2.1

children.title: tokenCredentialsUri
children.description: The URI of the Token Request endpoint as defined in RFC5849 Section 2.3
